alert_name: SEO Poisoning - Search Engine Crawler Serving Malicious Vietnamese Keywords
description: Advanced URL Filtering detected SEO poisoning activity from government web server govagency[.]vn (10.30.25.112) where BadIIS module served keyword-stuffed malicious HTML to Googlebot search engine crawler. Traffic analysis shows HTTP request with User-Agent 'Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; Googlebot/2.1; +http://www.google.com/bot.html)' to govagency[.]vn receiving anomalous response containing Vietnamese gambling-related keywords and spam links. Response payload inspection (deep packet analysis) revealed 47KB HTML document filled with illegal streaming service terms: 'xôi lạc tv trực tiếp bóng đá hôm nay' (illegal soccer streaming), 'cá cược bóng đá trực tuyến' (online soccer betting), 'casino trực tuyến việt nam' (Vietnamese online casino), 'xem bóng đá miễn phí' (free soccer streaming). Content analysis detected 187 embedded hyperlinks pointing to attacker-controlled gambling domains: bet365-vn[.]com, xoilac-tv[.]net, casino88[.]asia, representing coordinated SEO manipulation campaign. The HTML contains hidden <div> elements (display:none) stuffed with keyword combinations to maximize search engine indexing without affecting legitimate user experience. URL Filtering categorized response as 'online-gambling' and 'phishing' based on content signatures. Network forensics show web server (govagency[.]vn) contacting upstream C2 server 404.008php[.]com (103.6.235[.]26) immediately before serving poisoned content to Googlebot, confirming BadIIS reverse proxy behavior - legitimate government server acting as intermediary for attacker's scam infrastructure. Threat intelligence correlation: domain 404.008php[.]com linked to CL-UNK-1037 (DragonRank/Group 9) SEO poisoning operations targeting Southeast Asian governments and businesses. Expected impact: Google search results for Vietnamese queries will rank govagency[.]vn for gambling/streaming keywords, exploiting government domain's high trust reputation to drive traffic to scam sites.
policy_description: Government web server serving SEO-poisoned content with Vietnamese gambling keywords to search engine crawlers
policy_recommendation: HIGH: Block C2 domain 404.008php[.]com and IP 103.6.235[.]26 at firewall, remove BadIIS module from WEB-PROD-03, request Google Search Console to remove poisoned indexed pages for govagency[.]vn, monitor search engine rankings for government domain (check Google/Bing/Cốc Cốc for gambling keyword associations), implement Content Security Policy (CSP) headers to prevent injection, enable IIS request/response logging with full content capture, deploy WAF rules to detect User-Agent spoofing, analyze IIS logs for additional crawler interactions, engage Google/Bing Webmaster support for emergency de-indexing of compromised pages
